title: Remove Caffeine branding line from landing page footer

requirements.summary: Delete the Caffeine “Built with … using caffeine.ai” footer line from the public Landing Page without changing any other footer content.
acceptanceCriteria: On the public landing page, the footer shows only the copyright line and no longer displays the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” line.
There is no remaining hyperlink to https://caffeine.ai/ in that footer area.
No other footer/header content is changed outside the selected element.

file_operations.description: Remove the second footer paragraph element (the line containing the Heart icon and the outbound caffeine.ai link) so only the copyright paragraph remains; limit changes strictly to that JSX block to match the specified XPath-selected element.
